name: whitespace-trimmer
title: Whitespace Trimmer
description: Remove trailing and leading whitespace from text files
content:
Overview

This application removes leading and trailing whitespace from each line in text files, with options to remove empty lines.

Features

  • Remove leading whitespace (spaces, tabs)
  • Remove trailing whitespace
  • Remove both leading and trailing whitespace
  • Optional empty line removal
  • Statistics on whitespace removed

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload your text file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a cleaned text file with the suffix '_trimmed.txt' in the specified output directory.
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_${RANDOM}_${RANDOM}"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/whitespace_trimmer.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
